Uses of Interface
org.epochx.op.ProgramSelector

Packages that use ProgramSelector
org.epochx.core   
org.epochx.op.selection   
 

Uses of ProgramSelector in org.epochx.core
 

Methods in org.epochx.core that return ProgramSelector
 ProgramSelector Model.getProgramSelector()
          Returns the component to be used to select individual programs from a breeding pool to undergo operations such as crossover and mutation.
 

Methods in org.epochx.core with parameters of type ProgramSelector
 void Model.setProgramSelector(ProgramSelector programSelector)
          Overwrites the default parent selector used to select parents to undergo a genetic operator from either a pool or the previous population.
 

Uses of ProgramSelector in org.epochx.op.selection
 

Classes in org.epochx.op.selection that implement ProgramSelector
 class FitnessProportionateSelector
          Fitness proportionate selection chooses programs with a probability proportional to their fitness inverted.
 class LinearRankSelector
          Linear rank selection chooses programs by fitness rank.
 class RandomSelector
          A random selector is a program and pool selector which provides no selection pressure.
 class TournamentSelector
          Tournament selection chooses programs through a tournament performed on a subset of the population.
